resources.string:
0 to 4 : No Depression or just Sad
5 to 9 : Mild Depression
10 to 14 : Moderate Depression
15 to 19 : Moderate to Severe Depression
more than 20 : Severe Depression
This application will be used to detect Depression. \nIn the end we will provide a score and personal recommend activities to help you reducing depression.
Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on thing, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed?
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way?
"做任何事都觉得沉闷或者根本不想做任何事"
情绪低落、抑郁或者绝望
难以入睡，容易惊醒；或相反睡觉时间过多
觉得疲倦或者没有活力
不喜欢自己，觉得自己做的不好，对自己失望
反应迟钝，或者比平常活动更多
有自杀或者自残的想法

This mobile application has been develop to detect depression based on Patient Health Questionnaire 9 (PHQ-9), Inc. No permission required to reproduce, translate, display or distribute. Data collected will be anonymous and will be used for just research related to depression.
This app is for non-commercial use and only used for research purpose.
